str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Two. A primary numeral; 'two'.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To dwell in, settle in, be established in (permanently), inhabit. From kata and oikeo; to house permanently, i.e. Reside.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Asia, i.e. Asia Minor, or only its western shore.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
And, even, also, namely.
From Hellas; a Hellen or inhabitant of Hellas; by extension a Greek-speaking person, especially a non-Jew.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.
To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
